Classes.Title: Beginner Guide
Classes.Description: An introduction into game development and how to start structuring your first game

Classes.Title: Intermediate Guide
Classes.Description: An intermediate guide that dives more into actual game functionality and more advanced concepts

Classes.Title: Intro to Game Development
Classes.Description: An introduction into designing a game and how clients and servers interact with each other
Schedule a 2-hour long 1-on-1 with me to ask any questions you have

Classes.Title: Group Questions
Classes.Description: Get into a group call with other people to ask any questions you have.

Classes.Title: Game Monetization Guide
Classes.Description: Learn how to properly monetize your game and drive sales

Classes.Title: After Launch Support Guide
Classes.Description: An in-depth guide showing you how to plan for post-release support as well as maintaining player count

Classes.Title: Start To Finish Game Dev
Classes.Description: Every game cycle, we choose a new game topic to program from start to finish. This is not an introduction guide and will go in depth with advanced concepts and ideas
